name: Tears in Rain
description:
Summary
Run a clinic with four terminal patients, while trying to find out how they feel about the End.

Goal
Keep your patients alive as long as possible to witness the tears before the rain.

Controls
WASD: Movement
Space: Interact

Compatibility
This version was built in and for Windows 10 only. No other compatibility was tested.
